bibl.title: Certificates of Merit, University of Edinburgh, to Jesse W. Lazear, [July 17], 1890

div1.p: Two University of Edinburgh certificates of merit, which were awarded to Lazear.

div1.head: Certificates of Merit, University of Edinburgh, to Jesse W. Lazear, [July 17], 1890
div1.p:
University of Edinburgh.
FIRST CLASS CERTIFICATE OF MERIT.
FACULTY OF MEDICINE

I Certify that Mr. J. W. Lazear
acquitted himself with high distinction as a Member of the Class of
Practical Anatomy in the Examinations on his own Dissections
during the Summer Session 1890 and obtained full percent of
the available marks and a medal.

University of Edinburgh.
FIRST CLASS CERTIFICATE OF MERIT.
FACULTY OF MEDICINE

I Certify that Mr. J. W. Lazear
acquitted himself with high distinction as a Member of the Class of
Practical Anatomy
during the Summer Session 1890 and obtained 95 percent of
the available marks.
